long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to PPAWS - Everything a pet owner needs!
PPAWS is a new-tab extension containing a wide range of pet-related information, accessible by a quick and simple search.

By clicking the "Add to Chrome" button you herby agree to installing this extension, as well as its Search services, Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

For more information please visit https://ppaws.co/
